comment: use lead_name, med_name, and dep_name to insert the name of a cat with that rank
trigger_events: The war with o_c has begun.
Rising tensions have finally come to a breaking point, a war against o_c has been declared.
After many moons of tensions between o_c and c_n, a formal war is declared.
A tension-thick air hangs low over the o_c border, until lead_name finally declares a war with o_c.
A formal war with o_c was been declared, marking a major turning point in the two Clans' relationships.
c_n launches a retaliatory strike against o_c, seeking justice for a past act of aggression, resulting in a back and forth war between the two Clans.
Fuelled by a simmering resentment, o_c initiates a war with c_n, determined to reclaim their disputed territory.
Amidst growing tensions, c_n launches a preemptive strike against o_c, fearing an imminent threat to their Clan's existence.
With the formation of battle strategies with dep_name completed, lead_name publicizes the war against o_c to the warriors and instructs them to ready themselves.

comment: a category is chosen randomly to affect the war once each moon.
but there are plenty of more complex/in-depth moon events that also affect the war.
rel_up: Rumors are circulating that o_c wishes the war would end.
Both c_n and o_c tire of the war, wishing for it to end.
Mutual exhaustion pushes both c_n and o_c to consider ending the war.
Neither c_n nor o_c wishes to lose cats to the war; they seem to be considering peace.
Murmurings of peace between c_n and o_c permeated the last Gathering.
The other Clan leaders pushed c_n and o_c to make peace at the last Gathering.
Seeking peace, c_n and o_c ponder an end to their war.
Despite the two Clans' decisions of war, the cats long to have a shared peace.
In the midst of conflict, a spark of understanding flickers between c_n and o_c cats, hinting at a potential path to peace.
Amidst turmoil, empathy blooms between the c_n and o_c leaders, kindling hope for reconciliation beyond the battlefield.
Among the clans, a yearning for peace emerges, bridging divides and nurturing a shared hope for harmony.
Hope finally begins to unite the Clanmates of c_n and o_c, fostering a shared vision of peace.
Surveying the number of bodies mustering in their medicine dens, c_n and o_c pray to StarClan for an end to the warfare.
During a harsh battle, c_n's cats showed sudden mercy to o_c's cats while encircling them. Perhaps this will teach o_c to be respectful and thankful.
While scanning over c_n, lead_name's ears fell flat as he observed the trembling apprentices traumatized by this dreadful war.
neutral: War continues to rage between c_n and o_c.
c_n warriors plan new battle strategies for the war against o_c.
c_n wishes the war with o_c would end.
c_n cats reinforce the camp walls in anticipation of o_c attacks.
c_n warriors evaluate their battle strategies for coming battles against o_c.
The war with o_c is disrupting the daily lives of c_n, forcing them to adapt to new routines and living situations in order to better defend themselves.
Nowadays, to adapt with the new war environment, c_n has been sending out extra night patrols to the o_c border.
The cats of both Clans, o_c and c_n, don't know when or how to anticipate battles anymore, everything has just been developing into a haywire mess.
The Clans tried to have a calm negotiation about the conflict at the last Gathering, but it lead nowhere except to a waste of time.
Tension continues to hang thick over the two at-war clans; o_c and c_n.
c_n patrols begin to bristle with hostility and anticipation when patrolling the o_c border.
o_c recently lead out a surprise attack to claim c_n territory, but to no avail.
lead_name isn't sure what to think of the whole war situation with o_c anymore, as it develops even further.
The war shows no signs of stopping, the hostility between c_n and o_c still going strong.
med_name gazes down at the recently accumulated herbs, wondering if they will be enough to tend to c_n's warriors during this war.

Mustered in a massive, open area, lead_name led c_n's warriors against o_c. The prolonged fray was vicious, but c_n triumphed in the battle, their celebratory yowls echoing as o_c, with tails tucked down, scurried away.

Mustered in a massive, open area, lead_name led c_n's warriors against o_c. The prolonged fray was vicious; however, c_n growled in defeat as they retreated into the darkness, their ears twitching at o_c's celebratory yowls behind them.
rel_down: o_c has taken some of c_n's territory.
c_n has taken some of o_c's territory.
War negotiations with o_c went badly at the last Gathering.
The tension between c_n and o_c is palpable, with even the smallest actions potentially leading to violence.
The hostile environment between c_n and o_c has been continuing to grow.
Any attempts at peace only seemed to make the whole war situation between c_n and o_c worse.
The cats of o_c and c_n are still keen on battle, with no yearn for peace shown between them.
lead_name is starting to notice how battles between o_c and c_n have been extremely aggressive recently.
Glares of unfriendliness and aggression are passed at most patrol interactions between c_n and o_c.
o_c's surprise attacks on c_n have been increasing significantly lately.
c_n's surprise attacks on o_c have been increasing significantly lately.
Even small sparks of disagreement between o_c and c_n can set off a huge battle.
c_n's cats can't stop themselves from instinctively unsheathing their claws upon encountering an o_c cat.

In the thick of a cold night, lead_name agreed to set up a meeting with the leader of o_c. At the end of the meeting, however, the two leaders could not agree on any points, leaving both frustrated and leading to the termination of the peace talks.

A warrior of c_n guided dep_name to an unforgivable scene they had spotted while on patrol; border lines were vandalized, and prey was strewn across the ground in heaps of fur, feathers, and blood. o_c will pay for this.

conclusion_events: The war with o_c has finally ended.
The cats of o_c and c_n finally agree to peace terms.
A truce is called and the war between o_c and c_n is ended.
With the many injuries both sides have suffered, o_c and c_n found common ground and ended the war.
The dust has finally settled of the war between o_c and c_n.
The leaders of both o_c and c_n decide that for the wellbeing of both Clans, the war should come to an end now.
After lots of bloodshed of both o_c and c_n cats, the two Clans have come to terms of peace.
The battles between o_c and c_n have ceased, the war now finally coming to an end.
o_c and c_n have had a long and complex past, but it's time for their battles to come to an end.
Many battles have been fought between o_c and c_n, but it's time for those to stop now.
The cats of both o_c and c_n have come to a realization that war isn't the best solution, deciding to end it now.
The piercing war cries of o_c and c_n have turned into tired, lifeless mewls... And the cats are glad as the war finally comes to a close.
The leaders of o_c and c_n have come to terms about the war, deciding that it would best for all the cats if it was formally settled here.
Remembering all the blood that was shed in the war, o_c and c_n have decided to finally settle it, once and for all.

In the thick of a cold night, lead_name agreed to set up a meeting with the leader of o_c. At the end of the meeting, with wide smiles, lead_name and the o_c leader found mutual peace for their Clans.
